title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
April 5, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today by telephone with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany.  The leaders discussed several issues of mutual concern and interest, including the conflict in eastern Ukraine and the situation in Afghanistan.  The leaders pledged close cooperation and coordination on these and other issues.  They agreed to remain in close contact.
